mapper.select: SELECT A.COMPANY_NAME , B.AD_WEEK , A.APPLY_DATE , A.POST_YN , A.STATE_CODE , A.POST_END_DATE , A.POST_START_DATE , A.PAY_DATE_2ND , A.AD_CODE , B.AD_PRICE , A.COMPANY_EMAIL , A.COMPANY_PHONE , A.COMPANY_LOCATION , A.USER_CODE , A.DECISION_CODE FROM AD_APPLY_TABLE A JOIN AD_MANAGE_TABLE B ON(B.AD_TYPE_CODE = A.AD_TYPE_CODE) WHERE A.USER_CODE = #{ userCode } ORDER BY A.APPLY_DATE DESC
SELECT AD_CODE , COUNT(*) CLICK_COUNT , COUNT(*)*150 MORE_PAY_AMOUNT FROM AD_CLICK_COUNT GROUP BY AD_CODE

SELECT B.AD_TYPE_CODE , B.AD_TYPE_NAME , B.AD_PRICE , B.AD_WEEK , A.COMPANY_NAME , A.COMPANY_NUMBER , A.COMPANY_PHONE , A.COMPANY_EMAIL , A.AD_CODE , A.AD_TITLE , A.AD_CONTENT , A.STATE_CODE , A.POST_END_DATE , C.PICTURE_UTIL_PATH , A.USER_CODE , A.DECISION_CODE FROM AD_APPLY_TABLE A JOIN AD_MANAGE_TABLE B ON(B.AD_TYPE_CODE = A.AD_TYPE_CODE) JOIN PICTURE_TABLE C ON(C.PICTURE_CODE = A.PICTURE_CODE) WHERE A.USER_CODE = #{ userCode } AND A.AD_CODE = #{ adCode }
mapper.update:
SELECT A.AD_WEEK FROM AD_MANAGE_TABLE A JOIN AD_APPLY_TABLE B ON(B.AD_TYPE_CODE = A.AD_TYPE_CODE) WHERE B.AD_CODE = #{ adCode }
UPDATE AD_APPLY_TABLE SET PAY_DATE_1ST = SYSDATE , POST_YN = 'Y' , POST_START_DATE = SYSDATE + 1 , POST_END_DATE = SYSDATE + (#{ adWeek }*7+1) WHERE AD_CODE = #{ adCode }
